MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.EntityHandling ExpandCharEntities = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Expands character entities and returns general entities as <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference> nodes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A> to see what the general entities expand to. This enables you to optimize entity handling by only expanding the entity the first time it is used.
When set to ExpandCharEntities, a reader call to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A> method expands all entities (both general and character entities).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.EntityHandling ExpandEntities = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Expands all entities and returns the expanded nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> nodes are not returned. The entity text is expanded in place of the entity references.
